full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Janitorial Services for Port aux Basques MCTS Centre

**Solicitation Number:** 30005177  
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-12  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-06T14:00:00  
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-01  
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-06-30  

**Description of Work:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites proposals for janitorial services at its Port aux Basques MCTS Centre located in Port aux Basques, NL. The centre is a two-level building with a total area of 948 m² (10,211.93 ft²), divided into 600.37 m² (6,462.32 ft²) on the first floor and 348.35 m² (3,749.61 ft²) on the second floor. The centre houses approximately 18 employees.

The contracting authority is seeking a reliable and efficient provider to perform the following tasks:

* Perform janitorial services, including cleaning floors, surfaces, and equipment
* Maintain the building in a clean and safe condition
* Deliver the services in accordance with established schedules and protocols

**Terms and Conditions:**

* Contract Duration: Two-year contract with an optional two one-year extensions
* Service Period: July 31, 2024, to June 30, 2026
* All inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the tender closing date.

** Tender Notification:**

Notices for this solicitation can be downloaded from the Canadabuy site:  
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/35942/30005177---rfp\-\(en\_final.pdf\) and  
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/35942/30005177\-addendum\-addenda\-001.pdf

To respond to this solicitation, please follow the link to the Canadabuy site and download the solicitation package by the tender closing date. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

* Lana Hunt
* Contact Person
* DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca (Email)
* (604) 355-0314 (Phone)
